styles: .PageLayout{font-family: 'Lucida Grande',Verdana,Arial,Sans-Serif;background-color: #e7e7e7;height: 100vh}.PageLayout__content{max-width: 760px;margin: auto;border: 1px solid #959596;border-radius: 10px;background-color: white;padding: 0;}.contentLayout{font-family: 'Lucida Grande',Verdana,Arial,Sans-Serif;padding: 0 0 20px 45px;}.myPosts{width: 450px;}.headerLayout{margin: 10px 10px 0 10px;height: 192px;text-align: center;background: $header-background;border-radius: 10px;}.headerText{flex: 1;}.HeaderText__title{color: #fff;padding-top: 70px;margin: 0;font-family: 'Trebuchet MS','Lucida Grande',Verdana,Arial,Sans-Serif;font-size: 2.5em;font-weight: bold;}.HeaderText__tagline{color: #fff;font-size:0.8em;}.PostBody{margin: 30px 0 0;}.PostTitle, .PostTitle a{color: #333;font-family: 'Trebuchet MS','Lucida Grande',Verdana,Arial,Sans-Serif;font-size: 19.2px;font-weight: bold;margin: 0;text-decoration: none;}.PostTitle a:hover{color: #06c;}.PostDate{font-size: 0.68em;color: #777}.PostAuthor{font-size: 0.68em;color: #777}.PostContent{margin-top: 10px;font-size: 12px;}.sidebarLayout{width: 190px;background-color: #f9f9f9;padding: 1.2em;}.SearchWidget{text-align: center;margin-bottom: 15px;}.MenuWidget{color: inherit;}.MenuWidget__link a{text-decoration: none;font-size: 0.65em;}.MenuWidget__link::before{font-size: 0.65em;content: 'â€¢ ';}.FooterText{font-size: 0.65em;text-align: center;flex: 1;text-decoration: none;padding: 20px 0;}.FooterText a{text-decoration: none;}.postDateAndAuthor { justify-content: flex-start; } .postDateAndAuthor > span { padding-right: 0.5em; }
